title: @riot why is unlimited wave clear bad for mages but okay for assassins?
body: I don't think I know of any other class forced into a set build path than mages (referring to {{champion:63}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:90}}, etc) where mana is an issue before even finding out who your matchup is! To my understanding mana was nerfed because mages were overbearing in the lane for wave clearing and sending x champion back (unfun to play against). Can I ask what the hell are mages are supposed to excel at? aoe team damage doesn't really apply when the team fight is over in under 1-2 seconds. Why is it okay that {{champion:238}}{{champion:157}} has unlimited wave clear potential but its not okay if {{champion:161}} does?
